item.title: Sintax Markdown
item.description: 1 Headings Headings from h2 through h6 are constructed with a # for each level: ## h2 Heading ### h3 Heading #### h4 Heading ##### h5 Heading ###### h6 Heading The HTML looks like this: <h2>h2 Heading</h2> <h3>h3 Heading</h3> <h4>h4 Heading</h4> <h5>h5 Heading</h5> <h6>h6 Heading</h6> To add a custom heading ID, enclose the custom ID in curly braces on the same line as the heading: ### A Great Heading {#custom-id} The HTML looks like this:
